resources.string: Are you sure you want to remove this TripQuiz? It will just be hidden and your progress won\'t be deleted. Just search for it again and continue.
You need to check in at this location in order to see any further tasks!
You don\'t have any TripQuiz currently. Scroll to the right and pick one!

Your search result has not returned a TripQuiz. Try a different term or just hit the search button without any term to see what\'s close to you! Consider visiting \'trip-quiz.com\' to create your own!
Find your TripQuiz by entering a search term into the text box - or just hit the search button and see what\'s close to you! For an accurate position enabling of WIFI along with GPS is recommended
